#summary Installation instructions

= Installation Instructions =


= Software - Mandatory =

  * Python
  * Dolfin - FEM assembly
  * Scipy - Matrices assembly
  * PyAmg - Solver for linear equations system
  * rnv - XML file check against grammar

= Software - Optional =

 * Gmsh - Mesh Generation
 * Paraview - Results Visualization
 * svn - Code version management
